room_title: Escape room "The Great Bank Caper" by Louisville Escape in Louisville
review: Our family of 6 enjoyed the Bank Caper! We received just enough help from our awesome host, Dominic, to challenge us but also keep us on the right track. It was a lot of fun to engage with the room and also work together!! Definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Bank Caper" by Louisville Escape in Louisville
review: I had a great time and recommend it as a fun group activity. The staff was nice and friendly. We did the bank heist and our group was 8 people. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because the room was a little small for 8 people.

room_title: Escape room "The Great Bank Caper" by Louisville Escape in Louisville
review: This was our first experience with an escape room. We did the Bank Caper. It was intense but we really enjoyed it. Kelly was fantastic.
